subject: suggestions?

Does anyone have any suggestions for getting "them" to talk to you? I have started using a voice recorder, they are not talking any more to me. I dont really feel them around anymore, but once in a whjile, i wont swear by it but the other day i think one touched the top of my head and my foot in the kitchen. Just wondering if anyone has techniques that have worked to get them to respond and/or show themselves to me?
   
  amy
